trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> event is raised from within the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method after a session token (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) has been successfully read from the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>내에서 이벤트가 발생 된 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName>호출한 후 세션 토큰 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) 세션 쿠키에서 성공적으로 읽은.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>

trans-unit.source: In the event handler, you can modify properties of the session token before it is passed further along the pipeline and is used to authenticate the entity making the request (user).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기를 파이프라인을 통해 더 이상 전달 하 고 (사용자) 요청을 만드는 엔터티를 인증 하는 데 사용 하기 전에 세션 토큰의 속성을 수정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can access the token through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A> property.
After modifying the token, you can ensure that it is written back to the cookie by setting the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.ReissueCookie%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 토큰을 수정한 후 있습니다 수 것 기록 되어 있는지 확인할 다시 쿠키를 설정 하 여는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.ReissueCookie%2A>를 `true`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.ReissueCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> event is a cancelable event, and you can set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property (inherited from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>) to abort further processing of the request.
trans-unit.target: 마지막으로 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>이벤트는 취소할 수 있는 이벤트를 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>속성 (에서 상속 되며, <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>) 더 이상 요청 처리를 중단 합니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs"></xref> class that has the specified session token.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스에 지정 된 세션 토큰입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A> property is set to the token specified by the `sessionToken` parameter.
The session security token that was received.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to reissue the session cookie with the response.
trans-unit.target: 응답과 함께 세션 쿠키를 다시 실행 여부를 지정 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to reissue the session cookie with the response; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>응답과 함께 세션 쿠키를 다시 실행 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the session cookie is not reissued with the response.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, 세션 쿠키는 응답과 함께 다시 발행 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the session security token that was received.
trans-unit.target: 수신 된 세션 보안 토큰을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The session token that was received.
